articles.content: Argentina rugby captain Pablo Matera has revealed how his family was hammered with abusive messages over his tweets which were deemed to be racist and led to him being briefly suspended from the Puma… [+2285 chars]

articles.title: Tyler Wright wins historic first women's event at Hawaii's Banzai Pipeline - ABC News
articles.description: The two-time world champion won a tactical battle against local favourite Carissa Moore to make a perfect start to her 2021 championship campaign.
articles.content:
Australia's Tyler Wright has claimed a historic victory by taking out the first women's World Surfing League (WSL) tour event to be held at Hawaii's iconic Banzai Pipeline.

articles.title: Hannah Green secures massive payday, finishing second in LPGA Tour Championship - ABC News
articles.description: The LPGA Tour Championship is the richest tournament of the year, with $US3 million in prize money on offer.
articles.content:
Australian golfer Hannah Green has produced a bogey-free final round on her 24th birthday, to finish in a tie for second at the LPGA season finale.

articles.title: Antonio Brown catches first TD for Tampa Bay Buccaneers, who rally past Atlanta Falcons - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Antonio Brown's first TD catch as a Buccaneer capped Tampa Bay's big second-half comeback against the Falcons on Sunday.
